overview: Alik Barsoumian, Noah Garabedian, and Gregory Dolbashian’s “Gathering” film highlights a constructed language, an artistic approach to the language of music and dance. “Gathering” is a beautiful piece in which a musician’s solo evolves into a rhythmic dialogue when his sound summons his muse. The film was produced in 2021 within the framework of AGBU’s “Creative Armenia”. It was directed by Alik Tamar Barsoumian, the bass music composition and sound mixing were authored by Noah Garabedian, choreography and dance were authored by Gregory Dolbashian.
title: Gathering
